entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 5:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: ENE 41 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain this evening and ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to periods of snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
